ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.88"

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.88"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1246235161"/> <code code="eScene.09" codeSystemName="" displayName="Location type"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> </observation>
